+
+package sun.nio.fs;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import java.nio.file.attribute.FileTime;
+
+class BsdPosixFileAttributeView extends UnixFileAttributeViews.Posix
+{
+    BsdPosixFileAttributeView(UnixPath file, boolean followLinks) {
+        super(file, followLinks);
+    }
+
+    @Override
+    public void setTimes(FileTime lastModifiedTime,
+                         FileTime lastAccessTime,
+                         FileTime createTime) throws IOException
+    {
+        BsdBasicFileAttributeView.setFileTimes(file, lastModifiedTime,
+                                               lastAccessTime, createTime,
+                                               followLinks);
+    }
+}
